text: annalil paluttik kontirukkum ovvoru tayum, tan paluttum kulantaiyai marantuvituvataiyum ovvoru karppinip pennin karuvum citaintu vituvataiyum ninkal kanpirkal. (Napiye!) Manitarkalai mati mayankiyavarkalaka nir kanpir. Avarkal (matiyilakkum karanam) potaiyinal alla. Allahvutaiya vetanai mikka katinamanatu. (Ataik kantu titukkittu avarkal matiyilantu vituvarkal)
